title: Arya Marriage Validation Act, 1937
description: Official consolidated text of Arya Marriage Validation Act, 1937 (XIX of 1937) published by The Pakistan Code (Family Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and extent
provisions.content:
(1) This Act may be called the Arya Marriage Validation Act,
1937.
1
[(2) It extends to the whole of Pakistan and applies also to all citizens of Pakistan wherever
they may be.]

provisions.title: Section 2. Marriage between Arya Samajists not to be invalid. Notwithstanding any provision of
provisions.content:
Hindu Law, usage or custom to the contrary no marriage contracted whether before or after the
commencement of this Act between two persons being at the time of the marriage Arya Samajists
shall be invalid or shall be deemed ever to have been invalid by reason only of the fact that the
parties at any time belonged to different castes or different sub-castes of Hindus or that either or both
of the parties at any time before the marriage belonged to a religion other than Hinduism.
___________
Date: 22-07-2024
1
Subs. by the Central Laws (Statute Reform) Ordinance, 1960 (21 of 1960), s. 3. and 2nd Sch.
